text: Mba guma mba buni nzua vov wom khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu vhɨra buni thari khergip, Smerna ŋgu bakɨmen ki sios gari enser ndi mbarari. Mba buni khaŋ muuŋgi, ‘Gu nduara, gu Guigira Fharav Ki Guma ma, gu vhɨra Guigira Zɨn Ki Guma ma. Gu fhum rimgiap, gu ntige khavgiap, gu khar ki. Gu kha bunin nde ndi mbai.
